subtitle:
1
00:00:34,800 --> 00:00:40,000
góa bat chòe-kòe gōng cha-bó͘-gín-á
I used to be a foolish girl

2
00:00:40,000 --> 00:00:42,500
chhēng i ê chhián-thoa
Wearing his slippers

3
00:00:42,500 --> 00:00:47,500
chhin-chhiūⁿ i ê hit chi̍t-pòaⁿ
Like I was his other half

4
00:00:47,500 --> 00:00:51,000
nn̄g-ê lâng hiah-nī hó
Two people so close

5
00:00:51,000 --> 00:00:52,800
kiâⁿ kàu bóe
Walking to the end

6
00:00:52,800 --> 00:00:55,000
bô óa-khò
With no one to rely on

7
00:00:55,000 --> 00:00:58,000
ài chhin-chhiūⁿ sap-bûn-pho
Love is like soap bubbles

8
00:00:58,000 --> 00:01:03,500
chêng-hūn ná chiah-nī po̍h
Why is the connection so fragile?

9
00:01:04,500 --> 00:01:07,500
thâu-mn̂g chiah iù
Hair so fine and soft

10
00:01:07,500 --> 00:01:10,800
miā ná bô chiah hó
Why is my fate not as good?

11
00:01:10,800 --> 00:01:13,800
pa̍t-lâng leh chhit-thô
Others are out having fun

12
00:01:13,800 --> 00:01:17,500
góa ūi seng-oa̍h piàⁿ tām-po̍h
I struggle a bit for a living

13
00:01:17,500 --> 00:01:20,500
chi̍t-ê-lâng ak-hō͘
One person in the rain

14
00:01:20,500 --> 00:01:24,000
iā m̄ kam-goān hoah khó͘
Unwilling to cry out in pain

15
00:01:24,000 --> 00:01:27,500
in-ūi góa ê chhiò-bīn
Because my smiling face

16
00:01:27,500 --> 00:01:31,000
sī góa ê ku̍t-kiông
Is my stubbornness

17
00:01:32,800 --> 00:01:36,000
chiong gún ê tn̂g thâu-chang
Taking my long hair

18
00:01:36,000 --> 00:01:39,000
chián chòe té thâu-chang
Cutting it short

19
00:01:39,000 --> 00:01:42,000
cha-bó͘-lâng ê sim
A woman's heart

20
00:01:42,000 --> 00:01:46,000
siong-hûn bōe-kham-leh khàng
Has scars that are hard to bear

21
00:01:46,000 --> 00:01:49,500
siàu-liân-sî kóng kah chiah hó
Spoken so well in our youth

22
00:01:49,500 --> 00:01:53,500
bí-lē ê bāng
Beautiful dreams

23
00:01:53,500 --> 00:01:56,500
gōng-lâng chiah ē siong-sìn
Only fools would believe

24
00:01:56,500 --> 00:02:00,500
bô-hāu ê chiù-chōa
Those invalid vows

25
00:02:01,000 --> 00:02:04,500
chiong gún ê té thâu-chang
Taking my short hair

26
00:02:04,500 --> 00:02:07,500
ní tńg o͘ thâu-chang
Dyeing it back to black

27
00:02:07,500 --> 00:02:10,500
bōe cha̍p-peh ê sim
A heart not yet eighteen

28
00:02:10,500 --> 00:02:14,000
tùi ài iáu-ū hi-bāng
Still has hope for love

29
00:02:14,000 --> 00:02:17,500
ū-chi̍t-kang góa ē tú-tio̍h
One day I will meet

30
00:02:17,500 --> 00:02:21,500
miā-tiong iân-hūn chù-tiāⁿ ê hit ê lâng
The person destined by fate

31
00:02:21,500 --> 00:02:25,500
góa ē-tàng ūi i chhēng
I can wear for him

32
00:02:25,500 --> 00:02:30,000
hit niá sin-niû-saⁿ
That wedding dress

33
00:02:41,000 --> 00:02:44,000
thâu-mn̂g chiah iù
Hair so fine and soft

34
00:02:44,000 --> 00:02:47,000
miā ná bô chiah hó
Why is my fate not as good?

35
00:02:47,000 --> 00:02:50,000
pa̍t-lâng leh chhit-thô
Others are out having fun

36
00:02:50,000 --> 00:02:54,000
góa ūi seng-oa̍h piàⁿ tām-po̍h
I struggle a bit for a living

37
00:02:54,000 --> 00:02:57,000
chi̍t-ê-lâng ak-hō͘
One person in the rain

38
00:02:57,000 --> 00:03:00,800
iā m̄ kam-goān hoah gōa khó͘
Unwilling to cry out how bitter it is

39
00:03:00,800 --> 00:03:04,000
in-ūi góa ê chhiò-bīn
Because my smiling face

40
00:03:04,000 --> 00:03:07,000
sī góa ê ku̍t-kiông
Is my stubbornness

41
00:03:07,000 --> 00:03:10,500
chiong gún ê té thâu-chang
Taking my short hair

42
00:03:10,500 --> 00:03:13,500
ní tńg o͘ thâu-chang
Dyeing it back to black

43
00:03:13,500 --> 00:03:16,500
bōe cha̍p-peh ê sim
A heart not yet eighteen

44
00:03:16,500 --> 00:03:20,500
tùi ài iáu-ū hi-bāng
Still has hope for love

45
00:03:20,500 --> 00:03:24,000
ū-chi̍t-kang góa ē tú-tio̍h
One day I will meet

46
00:03:24,000 --> 00:03:28,500
miā-tiong iân-hūn chù-tiāⁿ ê hit ê lâng
The person destined by fate

47
00:03:28,500 --> 00:03:32,000
góa ē-tàng ūi i
I will be able to, for him

48
00:03:32,000 --> 00:03:37,000
chhēng hit niá sin-niû-saⁿ
Wear that wedding dress

49
00:03:56,500 --> 00:03:59,500
gún ê tn̂g thâu-chang
Taking my long hair

50
00:03:59,500 --> 00:04:02,500
chián chòe té thâu-chang
Cutting it short

51
00:04:02,500 --> 00:04:05,500
cha-bó͘-lâng ê sim
A woman's heart

52
00:04:05,500 --> 00:04:09,000
siong-hûn bōe-kham-leh khàng
Has scars that are hard to bear

53
00:04:09,000 --> 00:04:13,000
siàu-liân-sî kóng kah chiah hó
Spoken so well in our youth

54
00:04:13,000 --> 00:04:16,500
bí-lē ê bāng
Beautiful dreams

55
00:04:16,500 --> 00:04:19,500
siōng-hó ê miā
The very best life

56
00:04:19,500 --> 00:04:23,500
lóng-sī pa̍t-lâng ê hó-miā
Is always someone else's good life

57
00:04:23,500 --> 00:04:26,500
tī Tâi-pak kúi-lō tang
In Taipei for several years

58
00:04:26,500 --> 00:04:29,500
gún iā piàn tōa-lâng
I have become an adult too

59
00:04:29,500 --> 00:04:33,500
kòe saⁿ-cha̍p ê góa
Me, past thirty

60
00:04:33,500 --> 00:04:37,500
kám ē ū-lâng m̄-kam
Will anyone cherish me?

61
00:04:37,500 --> 00:04:41,500
ū-chi̍t-kang góa ē chhēng tio̍h
One day I will wear

62
00:04:41,500 --> 00:04:44,000
miā-tiong iân-hūn chù-tiāⁿ ê
The one destined by fate

63
00:04:44,000 --> 00:04:46,000
kòa tī hia
Hanging there

64
00:04:46,000 --> 00:04:50,000
hō͘ gún ji̍t-su iā-bāng
Making me dream day and night

65
00:04:50,000 --> 00:04:56,000
hit niá sin-niû-saⁿ
That wedding dress
